name: Deity's Form
description:
Transform into your various forms to counter the enemy types that come in waves that throw themselves upon the pyre of your fury just to slow your escape. While you are powerful, their coordinated attacks can still harm you in your weakened state. Slay as many of the waves as possible before they can strike!

Controls:
Movement - W, A, S, D
Attacking - Left Click 
Switch Forms - Q, E

Currently, Deity's Form is in a pre-alpha state with the core gameplay & assets still being subject to changes and implementation as we move towards Alpha.

As it stands, there is no end to the game and rooms will continue to spawn until the player dies.

Should you wish to give us some anonymous feedback on the current state of the game, we have a form below!

https://forms.gle/PnXADM8RpbRN7hZ4A
